317020.name: Pajama Sam: Games to Play on Any Day
317020.description:
Hours of fun and games with a superhero twist!

Pajama Sam, star of award-winning adventure games, continues to challenge and inspire kids. Now your child can play all day, the superhero way, with a collection of 10 unique play experiences based on classic games and puzzles.

  • STRATEGIC THINKING: Capture your opponent's beans!
  • CONCENTRATION: Memorize and match the squares!
  • COUNTING: Race to the top to win!
  • PROBLEM SOLVING: Complete the picture puzzle!

This product uses ScummVM across Windows, Mac and GNU/Linux which is released under the GNU GPL v2.
For more information, please visit -
The GNU GPL can be viewed here -
